/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their bare branches reaching out into the sky, suggesting that the season might be winter or early spring. The sky above is a hazy blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban scene. In the distance, buildings rise, their silhouettes faint against the sky. A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a human element to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and the buildings, and gives a sense of depth and scale to the landscape.
